home.subtitle: I'm Full Stack Developer from Argentina.
home.description: I am a Full Stack web developer and a student of Business Administration, boasting over 1 year of hands-on experience. My preferred tools on the frontend include Next, Typescript, and Tailwind, while on the backend, I am adaptable and proficient in various technologies.
